title: Some papers proper to be read before the R-L Society concerning the Terrestrial Chrysipus, Golden-foot or Guinea : an insect, or vegetable, resembling the Polypus, which hath this surprising property, that being cut into several pieces, each piece becomes a perfect animal, or vegetable, as complete as that of which it was originally only a part / collected by Petrus Gualterus, but not published till after his death
